root.str: Apply the Halftone camo pattern to your weapon. TR use only.
Decreases the time taken to reload weapon by 13.125%
Reduces the acquire timer of the Magrider by 810 seconds.
You must stop moving to squad deploy.
Apply the Pumpkin Patch camo pattern to your armor. VS use only.
Applies a banner to your character. TR use only.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 225 rounds.
The Cutlass EM5's lightweight construction allows for accurate fire from the hip.

Damaging enemies now automatically spots them for you and allies, while kills from greater than 50 meters will clear spot checks on you and prevent new ones from being applied for one second. <font color="#dc9c36">Does not clear spot checks on vehicles.</font>
Participate in a Meltdown alert on any continent when the victor is declared. Your faction does not to be the winner.
Decreases the time taken to reload weapon by 0.3 seconds.
Increases xp and resource gain by 50% and squad xp gain by 5% for 1 month. Squad xp bonus stacks with other squad xp boosts. Boost can only be used on this character.
%0 would like to join your outfit!
Additional composite plating to complement the look of your soldier. NC use only.
Your targets can't avoid their date with the Gallows forever...
Adds a Headlight Cover to your Magrider.
<font color="#00FFAA">Field Officer Knightly:</font> Collect the researcher's datapad and bring it back to the flotilla. We can't let it fall into enemy hands.
Generates a dense mesh of nanites around the soldier that decays slowly while active, and absorbs up to 450 damage before failing. Regenerates to full in 24 seconds.
<font color="#00FFAA">Representative Foster:</font> Subterranean activity seems in line with our previous readings. You may proceed to the next location.
Killing an enemy while wielding a melee weapon or sidearm restores 325 health. This effect does not trigger on quick melee attacks.
This bundle provides the full set of schematics from the release of the construction system at a great discount! NC only.
<font color="#00FFAA">Dolan:</font> Let me ask you, "operative." Have you ever heard of Project Arquebus?
Drifter Jump Jets allow the user to glide for long periods of time, but lacks the vertical thrust of other jump jet types.
This energized shield has IFF properties that only allow authorized infantry units to pass through.

The Yumi burst rifle is capable of, after a short delay, unleashing a rapid five round volley. With proper shot placement, Yumi can strike down mid-range targets more quickly than most weapons in its class. All factions can use NS weapons.
Killing an enemy while wielding a melee weapon or sidearm restores 325 health. This effect does not trigger on quick melee attacks.
The CAS30 Tank Buster armor piercing rounds are highly effective against tanks. All factions can use this weapon.
Increases the top speed of the Lightning by 6 KPH.

Cloak does not drain while stationary, but prevents use of primary weapons while equipped. While moving, cloak lasts up to 14 seconds. When drained, recharges to full in 12 seconds while cloaked and stationary, or in 10 seconds while uncloaked.
<font color="#00FFAA">Facilitator Campner:</font> Our engineers tell me that in order to utilize the Storm Buoy you must first equip it to one of the Valkyrie frames.
Activate to deploy repairing nanites to nearby vehicles. They will repair some damage for a few seconds.
Primary weapon turret for the Chimera. Operated by the tank driver.
Further increases the range of the Radar Scrambler
Increases the Idle Timer on the Harasser to 30 minutes.
Turning this on will display notifications when your friends log on or off.
A 8x magnitude zoom precision sniper scope.
This energized shield has IFF properties that only allow authorized vehicles to pass through.

Equipped with an anti-armor SKEP warhead, the M9 was designed to lock-onto and destroy ground based vehicles, while retaining dumbfire capabilities for increased versatility. TR use only. <font color="#dc9c36">Optional Lockon: Armor</font>
TR: MAX Flame 01 Left: Rail: Extended Description
The standard-issue U-100 Lastly is a reliable sidearm with moderate punch, stable recoil, and 12-round magazine. NSO use only.
Revived soldiers come back with more health.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 200 rockets.
Adds 2 rounds to the default magazine size.
Increases the Idle Timer on the Sunderer to 13 minutes.
Decreases the time taken to reload weapon by 0.5 seconds.
Chrome Smiley Face Dead Hood Ornament
G20 Vulcan-H fires armor piercing 20mm rounds capable of damaging heavily armored targets. TR use only.
The Illuminated Skull Helmet causes terror in those unfortunate enough to oppose its wearer. TR use only.
Decreases the time taken to reload weapon by 0.24 seconds.
Reduces the movement speed penalty for crouching by 75%, and you gain increased jumping height.
Displays the distance to the target.
Although war has become no less brutal since the era of this helmet's namesake, it has become decidedly less messy. TR use only.
VS - Pistol - Mid - V3 Description(Delete Me -BB)
Reduces the acquire timer of the Prowler by 90 seconds.

Killing an enemy has a 15% chance to reduce the minimum cone of fire of you and your squadmates within 25 meters by 30% for 4 seconds. MAXes can equip and trigger this implant, but cannot receive the buff it offers.
Decreases the time taken to reload weapon by 0.4 seconds.
Activate to disrupt lock-on attempts and missiles tracking the vehicle for 8 seconds. Can be activated once every 25 seconds.
Operators with high customer satisfaction scores in leadership and battle prowess are awarded this special variant of the Nanite Systems v01 Headset.
Increases Merit & XP gains by 50% for 6 months. Boost can only be used on this character.
NC's Light A. Baron GOLD Description
The control node is in TR hands.
NC Heavy Assault Personal Shield Rank 1

<font color="#00FFAA">Field Officer Knightly:</font> What a waste of time! Was this all just to knock out some researcher's to-do list? I say we call in an orbital-- wait. Is that a keycard sticking out of the sand?
Apply the single use Scrub Forest camo pattern to your vehicle. VS use only. Single use camo can only be applied to one loadout one time and must be used on this character.
Attaches the Kobalt 50 Cal Coaxial Machine Gun to the Plasma Cannon. 50cal machine guns are effective against infantry targets.
Liberty Arsenal's LA11 Crusader features low, controllable recoil, giving it an advantage for long distance fire.
Adds 9 rounds to the default magazine size.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 250 rounds.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 100 rounds.
We've assigned you standard-issue combat equipment, the best of the Republic. Now go reconfigure your weapons and loadouts at that equipment terminal.
Customize your soldier's voice with this Calculating Voice Pack. TR Female use only.

<font color="#00FFAA">Facilitator Campner:</font> I am advised that this mission is of the utmost importance. Representative Foster is a highly valued member of Nanite Systems. Please proceed to one of the continents and we will begin our search.
This gold, right-handed NS-10 Burster fires flak rounds which detonate near enemy aircraft, shredding their armor. All factions can use NS weapons.
Creates a shield that protects against aerial bombardment, but does not have vehicle or player collision. TR only.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 54 rounds.
Increases the damage of the weapon
The Tempest is a hover jetbike capable of getting the driver and one passenger quickly to the front lines. The passenger is able to use most of their personal equipment while riding on the back.
Allows the Squad Leader to place yellow smoke as a rally point.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 400 rounds.
Decreases the time taken to reload weapon by 0.5 seconds.
Earn heal or shield recharge experience with the Combat Medic class abilities or Medical Applicator.
The standard assault rifle of the Terran Republic, the T1 Cycler features a 40-round magazine and a fast rate of fire, allowing it to remain effective in most situations. TR use only.
<font color="#00FFAA">Field Officer Knightly:</font> This lab must have been abandoned when the facility flooded, however I don't see any way out. What happened to all of the researchers?
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 56 grenades.
Are you new and totally lost?
Increases the amount of rockets carried
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 30 rounds.
You are in a no-deploy zone
Time to earn your keep. Shoot the bad guys, capture enemy bases, and defend the ones we own. The more you contribute to the war, the higher your Battle Rank gets. Pretty standard stuff.
Applies a Crystal Camo 02 camo pattern to your character. VS use only.
Apply the Palm camo pattern to your weapon. All factions can use this gear.
Retrieve energy readings from an Amp Station console found on Amerish (using the Analysis HUD implant can help locate the correct terminal)
The Saron HRB fires a fast and accurate armor damaging particle beam. Accuracy destabilizes for a split second after each shot. VS use only.
Apply the single use Desert Scrub v2 camo pattern to your weapon. TR use only. Single use camo can only be applied to one loadout one time and must be used on this character.
If your current fight has only a few deployed Sunderers, redeploy at a nearby base and bring in another. More spawn points keep fights alive!

After a short lock-on period, the Tomcat A2AM platform fires missiles which carry an explosive payload, melting the armor of heavy aircraft, while being less effective against smaller ones. NC use only.
This customization adds a Slate Blue decal to the cockpit glass. TR use only.
Enemies within 5 meters of you will receive 50 small arms damage per second from the nano-machine swarm surrounding you. <font color="#dc9c36">MAX units can equip.</font>
Visit the Outfit Vendor on Sanctuary
Be aware of your surroundings. In this war, there are no front lines. Your enemies can be anywhere.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 6 shells.
Adds red chassis lights to the under carriage of the Magrider.
Scout Radar detects the movement of hostiles at a range of 150 meters.
Wraps your Magrider in an obsidian trim. VS use only.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 600 rounds.
Reduces the acquire timer of the Sunderer by 900 seconds.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 42 rounds.
Apply the Indar Rock camo pattern to your armor. All factions can use this gear.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 6 shells.
The target is that control node!

The Proximity Radar certification for the Vanguard has been removed from the Utility slot and certification points have been refunded. Proximity Radar is now available as a Defense slot certification and can be repurchased there.
[*source*] has had their outfit rank changed to [*rank*].
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 100 rockets.
The NMG spontaneously creates a dense projectile-absorbing shield around the user. This shield absorbs a set amount of damage, and will need to recharge after stopping several projectiles.
[*target*] was removed from the squad due to an empire change.
Additional Lumifiber plating to complement the look of your soldier. NC use only.
Tanks have strong front armor but are more vulnerable on the sides and rear.
The Terran Republic has defended Peris!
While piloting a Galaxy or Valkyrie on Esamir, travel more than 10000m with at least 2 additional occupants inside.
Killing a vehicle within 25 meters restores one tick of ammunition for you or your vehicle. <font color="#dc9c36"> Works in vehicles.</font>
Charge - Use to quickly move forward to attack or escape. This ability has a short cooldown after use.
Applies an MLG decal to your vehicle.
Press %0 to quick deploy near squad leader
The first of many deaths on your path to bring liberty and freedom to all Auraxians! Now respawn at the Warpgate region.

Upon detonation, the Flash Grenade will temporarily blind, deafen, and reduce the accuracy of infantry within its blast radius, making it perfect for breaching crowded rooms.

3 second fuse.
When your shield is broken, you gain 12% of your maximum ability energy. This action can only occur once every 12 seconds.

<font color="#00FFAA">Campner:</font> Terran Republic high command have contracted Nascent Expeditions to breach the energy barrier surrounding the islands. While clever, they are understaffed and in need of our brand of mercenary assistance.
This bundle comes with one lucky green and gold pistol for each empire! Grab the "Jackpot" Cerberus, TX2 "Jackpot" Emperor, and LA3 "Jackpot" Desperado at a discounted price!
The player curfew will disconnect you in #count([*seconds*]).
Applies a camo to your weapon.
Adds 8 rounds to the default magazine size.
Reduces the acquire timer of the Mosquito by 360 seconds.
Killing an enemy increases rate of fire by 8% for 2.25 seconds. While this effect is active, your recoil and cone of fire bloom suffer significantly.
Hello again, soldier. Based on the data you've provided, we have confirmed that the collapse of the Northeastern Warpgate has, indeed, been the cause of the weather abnormalities in the region.
Applies a decal to your vehicle. TR use only.
Reduces minimum cone of fire and cone of fire recovery time.
Increases the power of the deployment shield by 40%.
This is a test of the campaign system
Bends light around the infiltrator, resulting in near perfect invisibility while motionless. Cloak lasts for up to 12 seconds, and regenerates to full in 8 seconds.
Reports indicate that enemy armor has been flooding the battlefield. It is time we display our technological superiority by deploying a Magrider and putting an end to the enemy's tanks.
Apply the Indar Plateau camo pattern to your weapon. All factions can use this gear.
Able to make rapid follow-up shots on air and ground vehicles
<font color="#00FFAA">Injured Researcher:</font> Hello? I can't really see you. Visor must be cloudy. Guess I owe Sherman 20 nanites. Said the Republic would never leave us behind.
Orphaned - Post Launch - Do not translate. Inertial Dampener 3
Adds 4 missiles to the default magazine size.

Chambered for the powerful .357 magnum cartridge, the snub-nosed Underboss revolver features a faster rate of fire and more controllable recoil than its bigger NS-44 brother. All factions can use this weapon.
Contains a NS-30 Vandal plus 1000 Certs

Purchase an enlistment contract that will set your default faction assignment to the New Conglomerate. While this contract is active, you will be able to join New Conglomerate Outfits. You may purchase a new contract at any time.

All Access Membership is required for contract purchase. Memberships that become inactive will place this character in the Freelance state, and prevent certain Outfit interactions, but will not boot you from an Outfit you are currently a part of. Contracts cannot be purchased by players currently within an Outfit.
Celebrate 5 years of war with these new anniversary goodies!
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 25 rounds.

<font color="#00FFAA">Foster:</font> With the help of operatives like yourself, we've discovered that Esamir's collapse was likely due to a disruption in the ancient technology hidden beneath the planet's surface. I'll assume you've received a Portable Mining Laser? Based on my discoveries, I felt it pertinent to arm as many operatives with these devices as possible.
Improve the Prowler's maximum forward speed and acceleration.
The Magrider defensive certification 'Reinforced Top Armor' has been removed. Spent certifications have been refunded.
Customize your Harasser with armor plating. TR use only.
Affectionately referred to as "The Boombox" by many NC soldiers, the Mjolnir's burst fire explosive rounds excel against armored targets in close quarters engagements.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 72 rounds.
Killing an enemy while wielding a melee weapon, or while within 5 meters of your target will cloak you for 2 seconds. Firing your weapon will immediately decloak you.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 48 rounds.
Adds 2 rockets to the default magazine size.
Increases the damage resistance to anti infantry weapons from 80% to 81.5%, this includes pistols, rifles, and vehicle mounted light machine guns.
Adds 3 rounds to the default magazine size.
Allows use of the long range 8x TriGon-8 sniper scope.
Refills your nanites to maximum capacity.
The P525 Marauder-H fires 40mm high explosive grenades that are effective against infantry and light armor. TR use only.
Can carry 3 additional rockets of any type.
Reduces the acquire timer of the Liberator by 180 seconds.

An underbarrel high explosive grenade launcher.
Pressing Gear Slot 1 hotkey will toggle the attachment.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 250 rounds.
Single Use Indar Dunes Weapon Camo
The duration the cloak can remain active is increased to 7 seconds and the charge time when depleted is decreased to 12.5 seconds.
Apply the Carbon Fiber camo pattern to your armor. TR use only.
Single Use Indar Dry Ocean Weapon Camo
Unlock the LAV-LA with a full complement of attachments. For NSO use only.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 280 rounds.
Use a light machine gun to kill enemy players.

The 8x magnification Optical Precision Scope was created for long-distance shots while retaining a respectable field of view for closer targets.

Hold Sprint to steady aim.
Proficiency with the Combat Medic class.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 700 rounds.
Rapidly locks on to and destroys ground-based vehicles
Masks player's appearance on enemy night vision scopes for 2 hours. Rank 17 required.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 168 rounds.
Decreases the time taken to reload weapon by 0.375 seconds.
Applies a camo to your armor, weapon or vehicle. NSO use only.
Decreases the time taken to reload weapon by 0.2 seconds.
Increased damage against vehicles and MAX units and will stick to them.
Adds 2 rounds to the default magazine size.
Creates a nanite field that regenerates health in a radius around you. The more teammates near you the stronger the field is.
NC: Customization - Rocket Launcher Decimator Promo
The Prowler may deploy, which increases main cannon projectile velocity by 50% and disables movement while active. The Prowler must not be moving to deploy.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 125 rounds.
NC - Auto-Pistol - Mid - V6 Description(Delete Me -BB)
You can send messages to players (even across factions!) by typing /tell playername.
Increases xp gain by 50% and squad xp gain by 5% for 6 months. Squad xp bonus stacks with other squad xp boosts. Boost can only be used on this character.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 100 rounds.
Increases the amount of nanites gained by 50%.

Welcome to Planetside 2! Dear players, please be aware that Planetside 2 is a PvP intensive MMOFPS. Prepare at the Warp Gate before you begin the battles and stay vigilant during your adventures on Auraxis.
The Spec. edition of the A-1M betters target acquisition through clear sights and an alternative reticle.
Reduces cooldown of Spitfire Auto-Turret by 10 seconds.

<font color="#00FFAA">Praetor Umatherin:</font> I can't believe the Terran Republic really thought they'd be able to win the war that way. I don't expect much, but the datapad will be delivered to our scientists to see what they can come up with.
Use any Carbine to kill enemies as a Light Assault.
Apply the Roller Chain camo pattern to your weapon. VS use only.
Command wanted to pass along some gear that belonged to you, come meet me in the Warpgate.
Roll out in style with this custom rail guard for your Sunderer. All factions can use this gear.
The trial period has started for [*item*].

Maximum Damage
Maximum Damage Range
Minimum Damage
Minimum Damage Range
Normal fall damage now starts at 30 meters and lethal fall damage starts near 90 meters. <font color="#dc9c36">MAX units can equip.</font>
<font color="#00FFAA">Field Officer Knightly:</font> That chemical signature is even stronger in your area. You're closing in on your target.
Increases the rotation speed of the Lightning by 5 degrees/second.
Increases the braking performance of the Magrider by 20%.
Customize your aircraft with these sleek Razor Fins. VS use only.
An imposing set of horns for a helmet.
Changes color of the cockpit glass to Auraximas Green.
Improved turn, roll, and agility. (More effective than previous rank)
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 540 rounds.
<font color="#00FFAA">Nanite Systems Console:</font> If you are expecting payment for services rendered, please speak with Facilitator Campner.
Survey the area of Staging Site Bravo in the Ymir Ruins region.
Get the most popular Scythe weapons at a discounted price!
Customize your ground vehicle by adding a "L" Gold Hood Ornament.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 8 rounds.
Applies a special J!nx Decal to your armor. All factions can use this gear.
Single Use Indar Highlands v1 Camo
Support Planetside 2 by becoming a Member!
Moving or Removing the personal waypoint is disabled during this step of the training.

<font color="#00FFAA">Field Officer Knightly</font> Looks like those stims had some effect, I can see it in your face, and I'm not sure it's a good look. Our researchers are continuing to work on the serum, and we might come up with something less detrimental in time.

This rail mounted zip light illuminates cloaked infiltrators and dark areas but the light can give away your position.

The light can be turned on and off with Toggle Attachment.
You do not have permission to withdraw #count([*asset*]) from the outfit armory.
Adds 10 rounds to the default magazine size.
This customization adds a Light Green decal to the cockpit glass. TR use only.

<font color="#00FFAA">Coordinator Tolland:</font> Hey, kid. You've just earned yourself a mostly-new pair of comfortable combat fatigues. Be sure to kick the dust out before you wear them. Mining can be dirty work.
Discarded NSO husks pieced together into semi-functional armor.
<font color="#00FFAA">FL-34:</font> Make your way to the drop-off point. And. Again. Do. Not. Die.
Allows the user to reach heights much farther than normal jumps.
Decreases the time taken to reload weapon by 0.09 seconds.

<font color="#00FFAA">FL-34:</font> Foster gave you that Lightning Arrester to keep people safe from lightning strikes, but what if... purely hypothetical, you could use some similar technology to call down the wrath of Thor on your enemies? There's gotta be a market for that, right?
Unlocks additional seats in the vehicle.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 480 rounds.
Increases the amount of damage the deployment shield can withstand by 100%.
Adds 1 rocket to the default magazine size.
Increases the Nano-Regen Device's recharge rate by 20% and range by 1 meter.
Controls the quality of advanced GPU-based physics for particle effects. Note, higher quality levels may affect performance. (Default: Off)
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 660 rounds.
Increases xp gain by 50% and squad xp gain by 5% for 7 days. Boost can only be used on this character.
There has been an error processing your order.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 450 rounds.
Applies a decal to your armor. TR use only.
Customize your ground vehicle by adding a "1" Gold Hood Ornament.

The NC crafted weapons using advanced magnetic (often referred to as gauss) technology combined with mining and construction equipment that were available to them when the war started. This resulted in coil-rifle and shotgun weapons that naturally fit their guerrilla warfare style: Hit the enemy first and hit them hard. This expertise in magnetic field technology was applied to their main battle tank, the <font color="#79A5FF">Vanguard</font>, allowing the already durable tank to equip a damage-mitigating forcefield. The NC has also found themselves employing various magnetically propelled shrapnel weapons, such as the handheld <font color="#79A5FF">Jackhammer</font> heavy shotgun or the vehicle-mounted <font color="#79A5FF">C85 Canister</font>. The <font color="#79A5FF">Phoenix</font> rocket launcher uses camera guided controls and can strike vehicles behind cover. The vehicle-mounted <font color="#79A5FF">Enforcer</font> fires accurate, magnetically-propelled anti-vehicle munitions at a steady rate.
Increases the duration of the Gate Shield Diffuser to 12 seconds.
Apply the Patriot camo pattern to your Vehicle. TR use only.
Generates a decaying shield of nanites around the soldier that mitigates 35% damage instead of preventing it. Damage taken does not cause this shield to drain more quickly. Lasts up to 15 seconds.
[*source*] has had their outfit rank changed to [*rank*].
Our skies are as dangerous as ever, we need you to pilot an ESF and assist in removing all air threats you can get your eyes and weapons on.
Increases the Idle Timer on the Magrider to 21 minutes.
Allows for automatic firing from the hip and reduces hipfire cone of fire by 25%. When in this state, your rate of fire is also doubled and heat per shot and damage per bullet is cut in half.
The Spawn Control Unit operates either the spawn tubes or spawn room force fields, or both.
Apply the Heavy Metal camo pattern to your weapon. TR use only.
Stealth increases the time for seeking weapons to establish a lock and also reduces the range at which the vehicle will automatically appear to enemies via proximity or radar.

USE
From the map screen Right-click on a facility to install this module.

DESCRIPTION
All friendly soldiers in the region of the installed facility gain a small amount of over time health regeneration.

Each craft will produce 5 of this module.

Lasts 20 minutes. Additional modules of this type increase the duration 20 minutes up to a max of 60 minutes.
Increases the weapon's reload speed by 11%.
<font color="#00FFAA">Facilitator Campner:</font> Proceed to the next area and deploy the Storm Buoys at that location.
Decreases the time taken to reload weapon by 7.5%

Built off of the NS-11, the NS-15M2 is an accurate, magazine-fed LMG that leaves little downtime during reloads. Its reputation as a reliable all-arounder makes it suitable for many types of combat situations. All factions can use NS weapons.
The [*faction*] bastion belonging to [*outfit*] has returned to orbit.

Awarded for mastery of the Flash, this Auraxium-infused Lumifiber trim is a testament to its owner's offroad prowess. NSO only. <font color="#dc9c36">Color of trim changes based on your current faction.</font>
Applies a banner to your character. NC use only.
Reduces the acquire timer of the Galaxy down to 17 minutes.
Roll out in style with this custom rail guard for your Sunderer. VS use only.
The U-200's high-impact rounds are capable of dropping opponents at close range with little notice, though its magazine size suffers in trade. NSO use only.
Increases the amount of ammunition in each magazine by 4.
Adds cyan chassis lights to the under carriage of the Lightning. TR use only.
The Illuminated Apex Helmet is based on ancient but effective designs that originated on Earth hundreds of years ago. TR use only.
Celebrate six years of PlanetSide 2 with this special bundle. Note: Bundle contains equivalent weapons and cosmetics for all 3 Empires.
Primary Left: Anti-Infantry: M1 Heavy Cycler
Engagement Radar has been equipped on all ESF by default and certs have been refunded.
VS - Pistol - Mid - V7 Description(Delete Me -BB)
Cannot invite [*target*] to the platoon because it is not valid.
This customization adds a Chrome decal to the cockpit glass. TR use only.
Finish the tutorial to access more zones.

Anti-Vehicle Grenades can stick to and damage vehicles and MAX units, but are less harmful to standard infantry.

3 second fuse.
Weapons in the submachine gun family are available to all infantry except MAX.

A modified version of the SR-100, engineered with lighter materials for mobility when aiming down the scope. The L75 trades stopping power over distance for more versatility in evolving combat environments. NSO use only.
Adds Hubcaps VS002 to your Flash. (DNT)
The G30 Walker is a heavy machine gun with a high elevation range and soft point ammunition designed to be more effective against aircraft. VS use only.
Repair Tool. Use to repair friendly vehicles, generators, and MAX infantry.
Determines the layout mode of the basic HUD elements e.g. health, shield, ammo, etc.
The Nanite Systems Peacekeeper Cannon fires canister rounds that spray shrapnel that is devastating to soft targets at close range.
The straight-pull bolt allows the sniper to chamber another round while aiming down sights.
Allows the use of low rocket-assisted jumps with a short cooldown.
Your personal shield is removed and replaced with 500 additional health. Equipment that adds or modifies shield health does not stack with this implant.
Applies a decal to your armor. Available for all factions.
Applies a decal to your vehicle. VS use only.
Reduces damage taken from small arms and heavy machine guns by 20%.

The fully automatic NS-61G Emissary operates comfortably at mid-range, thanks to its accuracy and large magazine. This variant of the NS-61 features a stylish gold finish. All factions can use this weapon.
